refnamediv.refpurpose: Searches through the one-line usage messages for a specified BRL-CAD library interface command and displays the name of each command where a match is found.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The aproposlib command searches through the one-line usage messages for a specified BRL-CAD library interface command and displays the name of each command where a match is found.
